description: Best deal in the area on a townhome! Over 1800 sqft, end-unit townhouse with 4 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms, finished with quality throughout. Large kitchen On the main floor with solid maple cabinetry, granite countertops, S/S appliances, under-cabinet lighting, built-in microwave range hood & separate family room. Other features include laminate flooring, separate dining space, big living room & a convenient powder room completes the main floor. Upstairs youâ€™ll find 3 generously sized bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms & the lower level offers a versatile 4th bedroom or home office. Enjoy the convenience of a PROPER DOUBLE SIDE BY SIDE garage & 2 sundecks! Located on the quiet side of the complex with your own private front yard space. Don't miss this opportunity!
